references.paper_title: Least-squares fitting of two 3-d point sets
references.reason: This paper provides a closed-form solution for 3D point set registration, a fundamental problem addressed and extended by the current work.
This paper presents a seminal method for 3D shape registration, which is a closely related task to point cloud assembly, providing a foundation for many subsequent approaches.

references.paper_title: Geometric Transformer for Fast and Robust Point Cloud Registration
references.reason: This paper proposes a state-of-the-art method for point cloud registration, which is compared against in the current work to demonstrate its improved performance.
This paper introduces SE(3)-transformers, a key component of the proposed method, providing a foundation for the development of the SE(3)xSE(3) equivariant transformer.

references.paper_title: Neural Shape Mating: Self-Supervised Object Assembly with Adversarial Shape Priors
references.reason: This paper addresses the closely related problem of fragment reassembly, which shares similar challenges and is directly compared to in the experimental evaluation.
